Earnings Call Insights: KB Home (KBH) Q1 2025

Management View

  • CEO Jeffrey Mezger announced a new CFO appointment, with Rob Dillard set to join as EVP and CFO, highlighting his extensive operational and financial background.
  • The company reported Q1 2025
